project.name: J-C089D-CMUD-01-ST02-DT02-DF18-CF01-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the PGSQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an environment variable. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.

iopair.name: J-C089D-CMUD-01-ST02-DT02-DF18-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_z3MKzyYVQqcEHuUbAWPu AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_Cb8CbwuEGQ OR db_sql_output_DWr4q1pQtZ OR database_insert_check_SpTubKSpmF) AND NOT timeout_3U68ZWiwRs) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_Cb8CbwuEGQ OR db_sql_output_DWr4q1pQtZ OR database_insert_check_SpTubKSpmF) OR timeout_3U68ZWiwRs OR controlled_exit_ppnw72gHQx)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_Cb8CbwuEGQ OR db_sql_output_DWr4q1pQtZ OR database_insert_check_SpTubKSpmF) AND NOT timeout_3U68ZWiwRs) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_Cb8CbwuEGQ OR db_sql_output_DWr4q1pQtZ OR database_insert_check_SpTubKSpmF) OR timeout_3U68ZWiwRs OR controlled_exit_ppnw72gHQx))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

$SS_TC_ROOT/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 5555 && sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-04/good_04.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_hYb3AfW8NDbHeKOY8AtJ AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_PAPp2s9nJh OR db_sql_output_N2aJ1XuDCe OR database_insert_check_9jWWe3hBa9) AND NOT timeout_y4Hbr9qbAD) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_PAPp2s9nJh OR db_sql_output_N2aJ1XuDCe OR database_insert_check_9jWWe3hBa9) OR timeout_y4Hbr9qbAD OR controlled_exit_yRsYKKHVdQ)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_PAPp2s9nJh OR db_sql_output_N2aJ1XuDCe OR database_insert_check_9jWWe3hBa9) AND NOT timeout_y4Hbr9qbAD) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_PAPp2s9nJh OR db_sql_output_N2aJ1XuDCe OR database_insert_check_9jWWe3hBa9) OR timeout_y4Hbr9qbAD OR controlled_exit_yRsYKKHVdQ))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
